name: Gaming Cube
description:
Journey of this Game:

I am Abdullah Khawaja...

This game is named Gaming Cube and the  reason I gave it this name is because the word gaming was matching to my Channel Gaming Entertainments:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCW84vTjeRW4OkL5PBdWJ68Q

 I make video about technology and one day I got interested in Game Development so this was my first game I made.

So the game is like:

1.The red cones are the enemy.

2.The yellow balls are your point.

3.You can only jump twice.

Then you have to go to open project and open my file "My First Game."

If there is any problem with the game do tell me in the comment session

(:Have fun and enjoy!!!:)
